title: Amazon Q Business to Google Drive
description: Use Amazon Q Business to build a generative AI application to derive insights from content present in a Google Drive repository.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: Amazon Q Business Application: Amazon Q Business application created with Google Drive as the data source.
Google Drive: The Google Drive repository that contains data to be indexed

AWS Lambda: AWS Lambda function `DataSourceSync` crawls and indexes the content from Google Drive. The Amazon Q Business application retrieves data from the indexed content and provides a generated response.
